sqlMap.select: select t2.*, t3.name as productName, t3.code as productCode, t4.name as providerName from T_CENTER_PRICEASK t1, T_CENTER_PRICEASKPROVIDER t2 , T_CENTER_PRODUCT t3, T_CENTER_PROVIDE t4 where t2.askId = t1.id and t1.productId = t3.id and t4.id = t2.providerId and t1.userId = #userId# and t1.type = #type# and t1.askDate = #askDate#
